name: Fleshy Friend
description:
Fleshy Friend:

Harvest and build your fleshy friend with organs!

Controls:

LEFT CLICK and drag to interact with the organs.

MOUSE SCROLL to rotate  organs.

KEYBOARD to name your friend :)

Credits:

Bobble: Art, Programing

Gneisskitty: Sound Effects
